channel.title: Galleries on Arun Gopinath
channel.description: Recent content in Galleries on Arun Gopinath

item.title: Roller Coaster ride
item.description: Roller Coaster ride “With peaks of joy and valleys of heartache, life is a roller coaster ride, the rise and fall of which defines our journey. It is both scary and exciting at the same time.” Sebastian Cole

item.title: Ripple effect
item.description: Turbulent and peaceful “The mind is everything. What you think you become.” Buddha

item.title: Pandemic times
item.description: Year of Uncertainity “Out of the void and vastness of the cosmos, life emerges; audacious, improbable. You and I are here. No other miracle is needed.” ― John Mark Green

item.title: Moments to cherish
item.description: Joyful times “I have realized that the past and future are real illusions, that they exist in the present, which is what there is and all there is.” ― Alan Wilson Watts
